item.title: How to fetch the entire list of tunables along with the values for a Ceph cluster node?
item.author: xxxx
item.description: In many cases we would like to get the active configurations from a Ceph node, either a monitor or an OSD node. A neat feature, I must say, is to probe the administrative socket file to get a listing of all the active configurations, be it on the OSD node or the monitor node. This comes handy when we have changed a setting and wants to confirm if it had indeed changed or not.
